 GooglePlus 
 Graduate application deadlines 
 The deadline to submit your application varies by program. Some  programs  also require you to submit other documents too, at the same time (for example, a portfolio or a writing sample). 
 Deadline dates are subject to change without prior notice. Priority will be given to applications submitted on time. In some cases, programs may continue to accept applications after the deadline has passed; please check with the  Graduate Program Assistant or Coordinator . 
 International students: submit your application and all supporting documents as early as you can, to allow yourself enough time to obtain the  immigration documents  you will need to come to Canada.
